summary: Teaches the move Sandstorm, a Rock-type status move that creates a sandstorm for 5 turns, damaging all non-Rock, Ground, or Steel types each turn and boosting the Special Defense of Rock-types.
typical_users: Rock-type teams for weather synergy and chip damage
Stall or hazard-stacking teams for residual damage
Pokémon with the Sand Rush or Sand Force abilities
Occasional use on support Pokémon for weather control
